languages.text: {n}Рядом с невестой стоит Джаспер — вокс-оператор, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_JasperSurvived}спасенный вами{/d} в звездной гавани при первом прилете на планету. Он тоже в гражданском.{/n}

{n}Standing next to her is her fiancé, Jaspar, the vox operator you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_JasperSurvived}rescued{/d} at the starport during your first visit to the planet. He, too, is wearing civilian clothes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Рядом с невестой стоит Джаспер — вокс-оператор, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_JasperSurvived}спасенный вами{/d} в звездной гавани при первом прилете на планету. Он тоже в гражданском.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Standing next to her is her fiance, Jaspar, the vox operator you rescued at the celestial harbour during your first visit to the planet. He, too, is wearing civilian clothes.{/n}
{n}Standing next to her is her fiance, Jaspar, the vox operator you rescued at the celestial harbour during your first visit to the planet. He, too, is wearing civilian clothes.{/n}
{n}Standing next to her is her fiancé, Jaspar, the vox operator you rescued at the starport during your first visit to the planet. He, too, is wearing civilian clothes.{/n}

{n}Standing next to her is her fiancé, Jaspar, the vox operator you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_JasperSurvived}rescued{/d} at the starport during your first visit to the planet. He, too, is wearing civilian clothes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Neben ihr steht ihr Verlobter Jaspar, der Vox-Operateur, den du bei deinem ersten Besuch auf dem Planeten im Raumhafen {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_JasperSurvived}gerettet{/d} hast. Auch er trägt zivile Kleidung.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Standing next to her is her fiancé, Jaspar, the vox operator you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_JasperSurvived}rescued{/d} at the starport during your first visit to the planet. He, too, is wearing civilian clothes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Neben ihr steht ihr Verlobter Jaspar, der Vox-Operateur, den du bei deinem ersten Besuch auf dem Planeten im Raumhafen gerettet hast. Auch er trägt zivile Kleidung.{/n}

languages.text: {n}À ses côtés se tient son fiancé Jaspar, l'opérateur-vox que vous avez {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_JasperSurvived}sauvé{/d} à l'astroport lors de votre première visite sur la planète. Lui aussi est habillé en civil.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Standing next to her is her fiancé, Jaspar, the vox operator you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_JasperSurvived}rescued{/d} at the starport during your first visit to the planet. He, too, is wearing civilian clothes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À ses côtés se tient son fiancé Jaspar, l'opérateur-vox que vous avez sauvé à l'astroport lors de votre première visite sur la planète. Lui aussi est habillé en civil.{/n}

languages.text: {n}站在她旁边的是她的未婚夫贾斯帕，穿着便服。他是你第一次来到这颗行星时，在星港{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_JasperSurvived}救出{/d}的音阵操作员。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Standing next to her is her fiancé, Jaspar, the vox operator you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_JasperSurvived}rescued{/d} at the starport during your first visit to the planet. He, too, is wearing civilian clothes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}站在她旁边的是她的未婚夫贾斯帕，穿着便服。他是你第一次来到这颗行星时，在星港救出的音阵操作员。{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼女の隣に立っているのは、婚約者のジャスパーだ。彼は、この惑星を初めて訪れたときにスターポートで{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_JasperSurvived}救出{/d}したヴォクス・オペレーターである。彼もまた普段着の姿だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Standing next to her is her fiancé, Jaspar, the vox operator you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_JasperSurvived}rescued{/d} at the starport during your first visit to the planet. He, too, is wearing civilian clothes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女の隣に立っているのは、婚約者のジャスパーだ。彼は、この惑星を初めて訪れたときにスターポートで救出したヴォクス・オペレーターである。彼もまた普段着の姿だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}A su lado está su prometido, Jaspar, el operador de voco que {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_JasperSurvived}rescataste{/d} en el puerto estelar durante tu primera visita al planeta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Standing next to her is her fiancé, Jaspar, the vox operator you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_JasperSurvived}rescued{/d} at the starport during your first visit to the planet. He, too, is wearing civilian clothes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A su lado está su prometido, Jaspar, el operador de voco que rescataste en el puerto estelar durante tu primera visita al planeta. También lleva ropa de civil.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yanındaysa nişanlısı voks operatörü Jaspar duruyor, onu da gezegene ilk geldiğinde yıldız limanında {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_JasperSurvived}kurtarmıştın{/d}. Onun da üzerine sivil kıyafet var.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Standing next to her is her fiancé, Jaspar, the vox operator you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Triumph_JasperSurvived}rescued{/d} at the starport during your first visit to the planet. He, too, is wearing civilian clothes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yanındaysa nişanlısı voks operatörü Jaspar duruyor, onu da gezegene ilk geldiğinde yıldız limanında kurtarmıştın. O da sivil bir kıyafet giyiyor.{/n}
